original_text:
And he called out with a mighty voice,
“Fallen, fallen is Babylon the great!
    She has become a dwelling place for demons,
a haunt for every unclean spirit,
    a haunt for every unclean bird,
    a haunt for every unclean and detestable beast.
korean_text: 힘찬 음성으로 외쳐 이르되 무너졌도다 무너졌도다 큰 성 바벨론이여 귀신의 처소와 각종 더러운 영이 모이는 곳과 각종 더럽고 가증한 새들이 모이는 곳이 되었도다

sentences.original_text: And he called out with a mighty voice
Fallen, fallen is Babylon the great!
She has become a dwelling place for demons
a haunt for every unclean spirit
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 더러운 영의 갈 곳이 되었으며

sentences.original_text: a haunt for every unclean bird
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 더러운 새의 갈 곳이 되었고

sentences.original_text: a haunt for every unclean and detestable beast.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 더럽고 가증한 짐승의 갈 곳이 되었느니라
